clean_data:
Tamer El Sayyad  
Saudi Arabia     +91   in/tamer elsayad  
Summary  
Experienced Enterprise Architect with 21 years of total experience Proven track record of success in 
developing implementing and managing complex enterprise solutions  with a balance of technology 
management and business skills Solid theoretical and practical backgrounds accompanied by academic studies affect all aspects of professional conduct Excellent problem solving and time management skills 
Managed and mentored teams of professionals to the delivery of high profile projects with an excellent 
standard of quality serving a variety of verticals and governmental entities   
Work Experiences  
Enterprise  Architect  GACA  January 2021  Present  
 Developed and implemented enterprise architecture frameworks and strategies to align IT initiatives with 
business goals and objectives  
 Led cross functional teams in designing and implementing enterprise wide systems ensuring scalability 
security and e fficiency  
 Conducted architecture assessments and recommended improving the organization's IT infrastructure and 
systems  
 Played a key role in digital transformation initiatives leveraging emerging technologies such as cloud computing big data and IoT to drive innovation and improve operational efficiency  
 Evaluated and selected technology vendors and solutions negotiating contracts and ensuring compliance with 
architectural standards  
 Mentored and guided junior architects and technical teams foster ing a culture of continuous learning and 
professional development  
 Achievements include GACA Digital strategy GACA Digital transformation New CRM implementation MS 
Dynamic CRM New e services portal Data warehouse projects business process reenginee ring EA tool 
implementation Qiyas of digital transformation journey  
Solution Architect  GACA  December  2015  December  2020  
 Gathered requirements and specifications from clients and users ensuring clear project understanding  
 Led design and implementation of complex enterprise solutions including ERP and CRM systems ensuring 
seamless integration  
 Ensured development teams adhered to architectural guidelines maintaining standards throughout the 
software development lifecycle  
 Provided technical guidance and support resolving complex issues  and ensuring successful project delivery  
 Spearheaded a 2 million SR E Government transformation project as an application architect overseeing the 
documentation of As Is architecture designing  and developing the To Be Target and performing a gap 
analysis to identify architectural gaps and create a roadmap  
 Orchestrated the development of the Drone Licensee Portal  Violations Management Portal  enhancing 
accessibility and efficiency in business processes  
 Led the privatization project for all Saudi Airports streamlining operations and improving overall efficiency  
 Managed the seamless migration of EXA data and EXA logic to the cloud resulting in enhanced data accessibility 
and processi ng capabilities  
Application Development Team Lead  GACA   December 2009   December 2015 
 Led numerous projects utilizing various technologies Oracle Web Center JAVA SharePoint ASPNET for large  
and small scale  initiatives  
 Oversaw the migration of aviation systems converting Mainframe and Client Server to a modern Enterprise 
SOA architecture deploying  critical back office functions as business services on the integration layer  
 Managed a 1 million SR GSN integration project providing  12 e services via Government Secure Network GSN 
and configuring for future  integration while applying SOA governance through SDLC    Participate in  the implementation of ITIL practices optimizing IT service management ITSM processes  
 Successfully deliv ered websites for King Abdelaziz King Khalid and King Fahd airports Aviation Investigation 
Bureau Customer Protection  Department and Saudi Academy for Civil Aviation  
 Managed significant projects including a 25 million SR GACA portal a 4 million SR  Executive Office portal and a 
22 million SR Enterprise  Content Management capturing managing and delivering organizational content and 
documents  
 Led a cross functional application development team resulting in a 23% improvement in team productivity and 
the successful deployment  of 142 services across 6 applications in the organization  
Technical Team Leader   Digital Chains  June 2004  December 2009  
 Led a 15 member team in delivering customized solutions using Microsoft technologies including SharePoint 
2007 and SQL Server  following proper software engineering life cycle  
 Strategically planned and managed daily weekly and monthly development activities optimizing resource 
allocation to ensure the  completion of projects within budg et maintaining high quality and achieving user 
satisfaction  
 Assumed responsibility for pre sales activities involving the selection and design of proposed solutions' 
architecture for clients  
 Successfully delivered on budget custom development solution s for RCJ  DMMR Naqaba Al Jazeera Paints 
Medad web portals leading to heightened user satisfaction  and enhanced  client relationships Implemented 
agile project management practices resulting in a 20% reduction in project lead time  
Senior Web Developer   AlAwael November  2002  June 2004  
 
Certifications  
 TOGAF 92 certification  The Open Group  
The most important endorsement for Enterprise Architects  
 COBIT 2019 foundation  ISACA  
Governance and management of enterprise information technology  
 Azure Fundamentals Certified  Microsoft  
The fundamentals of the cloud along with Azure's services architecture governance and management  
 SOA Certified Professional  Arcitura Education  
Formal accreditations that prov e proficiency in specific areas of services based technology computing and 
architecture  
 Professional Scrum Master  Scrumorg  
A Scrum Master is a guide to the Scrum team they help the team understand all Scrum practices  
 ITIL Foundation Service Management  Axelos  
Understand the key concepts of IT and digital service delivery
Skills  
 Technical Skills  Enterprise Architecture Solution Design and Implementation IT Strategy Development Cloud 
Computing  Business Analysis Microsoft Technologies SharePoint CRM SSIS  SQL Server HTML CSS 
JavaScript  
 Soft Skills Stakeholder Management Technical Leadership Risk Assessment and Mitigation Communication 
and Presentation  
 Areas of Interest Data Analytics Project Management System Architecture ITIL Service Management Governance COBIT  
Education  
 BSc  Computer Science  Mansoura University  Mansoura   Egypt  2002  
 Master of Business A dministrator MBA  GBS  2021

name: Tamer El Sayyad
resume_data:
Tamer El -Sayyad  
Saudi Arabia  elsayad.tamer@gmail.com   +966542554591   in/tamer -elsayad  
Summary  
Experienced Enterprise Architect with 21 years of total experience. Proven track record of success in 
developing, implementing, and managing complex enterprise solutions . with a balance of technology, 
management, and business skills. Solid theoretical and practical backgrounds, accompanied by academic studies, affect all aspects of professional conduct. Excellent problem solving and time management skills. 
Managed and mentored teams of professionals to the delivery of high- profile projects with an excellent 
standard of quality; serving a variety of verticals and governmental entities.   
Work Experiences  
Enterprise  Architect | GACA | January 2021 – Present  
• Developed and implemented enterprise architecture frameworks and strategies to align IT initiatives with 
business goals and objectives.  
• Led cross -functional teams in designing and implementing enterprise -wide systems, ensuring scalability, 
security, and e fficiency.  
• Conducted architecture assessments and recommended improving the organization's IT infrastructure and 
systems.  
• Played a key role in digital transformation initiatives, leveraging emerging technologies such as cloud computing, big data, and IoT to drive innovation and improve operational efficiency.  
• Evaluated and selected technology vendors and solutions, negotiating contracts and ensuring compliance with 
architectural standards.  
• Mentored and guided junior architects and technical teams, foster ing a culture of continuous learning and 
professional development.  
• Achievements include GACA Digital strategy, GACA Digital transformation, New CRM implementation (MS 
Dynamic CRM), New e -services portal, Data warehouse projects, business process reenginee ring, EA tool 
implementation, Qiyas of digital transformation journey.  
Solution Architect | GACA | December  2015 – December  2020  
• Gathered requirements and specifications from clients and users, ensuring clear project understanding.  
• Led design and implementation of complex enterprise solutions, including ERP and CRM systems, ensuring 
seamless integration.  
• Ensured development teams adhered to architectural guidelines, maintaining standards throughout the 
software development lifecycle.  
• Provided technical guidance and support, resolving complex issues,  and ensuring successful project delivery.  
• Spearheaded a 2- million SR E -Government transformation project as an application architect, overseeing the 
documentation of As -Is architecture, designing,  and developing the To -Be (Target), and performing a gap 
analysis to identify architectural gaps and create a roadmap.  
• Orchestrated the development of the Drone Licensee Portal,  Violations Management Portal  enhancing 
accessibility and efficiency in business processes.  
• Led the privatization project for all Saudi Airports, streamlining operations and improving overall efficiency.  
• Managed the seamless migration of EXA data and EXA logic to the cloud, resulting in enhanced data accessibility 
and processi ng capabilities.  
Application Development Team Lead  |GACA  | December 2009  – December 2015 
• Led numerous projects, utilizing various technologies (Oracle Web Center, JAVA, SharePoint, ASP.NET) for large - 
and small -scale  initiatives.  
• Oversaw the migration of aviation systems, converting Mainframe and Client -Server to a modern Enterprise 
SOA architecture, deploying  critical back -office functions as business services on the integration layer.  
• Managed a 1 million SR GSN integration project, providing  12 e -services via Government Secure Network (GSN) 
and configuring for future  integration while applying SOA governance through SDLC.   • Participate in  the implementation of ITIL practices, optimizing IT service management (ITSM) processes.  
• Successfully deliv ered websites for King Abdelaziz, King Khalid, and King Fahd airports, Aviation Investigation 
Bureau, Customer Protection  Department, and Saudi Academy for Civil Aviation.  
• Managed significant projects, including a 2.5 million SR GACA portal, a 4 million SR  Executive Office portal, and a 
22 million SR Enterprise  Content Management, capturing, managing, and delivering organizational content and 
documents.  
• Led a cross -functional application development team, resulting in a 23% improvement in team productivity and 
the successful deployment  of 142 services across 6 applications in the organization.  
Technical Team Leader |  Digital Chains | June 2004 – December 2009  
• Led a 15- member team in delivering customized solutions using Microsoft technologies, including SharePoint 
2007 and SQL Server,  following proper software engineering life cycle.  
• Strategically planned and managed daily, weekly, and monthly development activities, optimizing resource 
allocation to ensure the  completion of projects within budg et, maintaining high quality, and achieving user 
satisfaction.  
• Assumed responsibility for pre -sales activities, involving the selection and design of proposed solutions' 
architecture for clients.  
• Successfully delivered on -budget custom development solution s for RCJ , DMMR, Naqaba, Al -Jazeera Paints, 
Medad web portals, leading to heightened user satisfaction,  and enhanced  client relationships. Implemented 
agile project management practices, resulting in a 20% reduction in project lead time.  
Senior Web Developer |  Al-Awael |November  2002 – June 2004  
 
Certifications  
• TOGAF 9.2 certification | The Open Group  
The most important endorsement for Enterprise Architects  
• COBIT 2019 foundation | ISACA  
Governance and management of enterprise information technology  
• Azure Fundamentals Certified | Microsoft.  
The fundamentals of the cloud along with Azure's services, architecture, governance, and management.  
• SOA Certified Professional | Arcitura Education  
Formal accreditations that prov e proficiency in specific areas of services -based technology, computing, and 
architecture.  
• Professional Scrum Master | Scrum.org  
A Scrum Master is a guide to the Scrum team; they help the team understand all Scrum practices.  
• ITIL Foundation: Service Management. | Axelos  
Understand the key concepts of IT and digital service delivery.
Skills  
• Technical Skills:  Enterprise Architecture, Solution Design and Implementation, IT Strategy Development, Cloud 
Computing , Business Analysis, Microsoft Technologies (SharePoint ,CRM ,SSIS , SQL Server), HTML, CSS, 
JavaScript . 
• Soft Skills: Stakeholder Management, Technical Leadership, Risk Assessment and Mitigation, Communication 
and Presentation.  
• Areas of Interest: Data Analytics, Project Management, System Architecture, ITIL Service Management, Governance (COBIT) . 
Education  
• B.Sc.  Computer Science | Mansoura University | Mansoura,   Egypt | 2002  
• Master of Business A dministrator (MBA)  |GBS | 2021
